form.form_zero_based: Please choose a cost head for zero-based costing.
form.form_vendor_based: Please select a cost head for vendor-based costing.
form.form_customer_based: Please choose a cost head for customer-based costing.
form.AddRMDomestic_RawMaterialId_container: If the raw material you want to add is not in the listing, add it here.
form.addRMDomestic_RMToggle: Toggle to add a raw material not in the listing.
form.AddRMDomestic_Code_container: If you select the raw material code, the name, grade, and specification will be automatically filled.
form.AddRMDomestic_HasDifferentSource: Click the checkbox to add source and source location.
form.addRMDomestic_vendorToggle: If not available in the list, add it here.
form.addRMDomestic_cancel: Click here to cancel the form and go back to the raw material listing.
form.addRMDomestic_sendForApproval: Click here to send the raw material for approval.

addRawMaterialImport.Add_rm_import_zero_based: Please choose a cost head for zero-based costing.
addRawMaterialImport.Add_rm_import_vendor_based: Please select a cost head for vendor-based costing.
addRawMaterialImport.Add_rm_import_customer_based: Please choose a cost head for customer-based costing.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_RawMaterialId_container: If the raw material you want to add is not in the listing, add it here.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_RMToggle: If the RM you want to add is not in the listing, add it from here.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_Code_container: If you select the raw material code, the name, grade, and specification will be automatically filled.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_HasDifferentSource: Click the checkbox to add source and source location.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_vendorToggle: If not available in the list, add it here.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_cancel: Click here to cancel the form and go back to the raw material listing.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_sendForApproval: Click here to send the raw material for approval.

addRawMaterialSpecification.GradeIdAdd: After adding the raw material, this button will be enabled to add the raw material grade.
addRawMaterialSpecification.rm-specification-cancel: Click here to cancel the form and go back to the manage specification listing.
addRawMaterialSpecification.rm-specification-submit: Click here to add the material specification.

addRawMaterialAssociation.Association_RawMaterialName_container: If the raw material you want to add is not in the listing, add it here.
addRawMaterialAssociation.Association_MaterialTypeId_container: If the raw material you want to add is not in the listing, add it here.
addRawMaterialAssociation.rmAssociation_cancel: Click here to cancel the form and go back to the manage material listing
addRawMaterialAssociation.rmAssociation_Save: Click here to save the material.

addMaterial.AddMaterialType_Cancel: Click here to cancel the form and go back to the manage material listing
addMaterial.AddMaterialType_Save: Click here to save the material.
